alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jo Daviess, northwestern Carroll, northwestern Stephenson, eastern Jackson and northeastern Clinton Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Apple River to near Maquoketa. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Savanna, Lena, Bellevue, Stockton, Warren, Preston, Hanover, Elizabeth, Woodbine, Sabula, Miles, Scales Mound, Apple River, Winslow, Springbrook, Nora, Spragueville, Schapville, Massbach and Green Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
